  var web3 = require('web3');

 var Web3EthAbi = require('web3-eth-abi');

var Web3EthAbi = require('web3-eth-abi');
Web3EthAbi.encodeParameters(['uint256', 'uint256' , 'uint256' ,'uint256','uint256','address'],values);
Web3EthAbi.encodeParameters(['address'],[0x0015B111f899FB6B11b6c3b1A4DB652Ce9CbC994]);
